duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately maintain employee records and ensure HR compliance.
Support staffing needs including recruiting, promotions, and transfers processing.
Handle administrative tasks including onboarding, exit interviews, and data entry into HR information systems.
Conduct impartial investigations into HR-related matters and escalate serious employee issues to HR leadership.
Provide frontline support to all employees for minor questions and assistance.
Implement programs to help improve employee experience and make informed and independent decisions with minimal guidance.
Produce and submit reports on general HR activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field (Master's preferred)
